actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to declare that all right, title, and interest of the United States in 2,640 acres, more or less, are hereby held by the United States in trust for the Paiute-Shoshone Tribe of the Fallon Indian Reservation, Nevada.

summary.text: Declares that all right, title, and interest of the United States in two thousand six hundred and forty acres, more or less, are hereby held by the United States in trust for the Paiute-Shoshone Tribe of the Fallon Indian Reservation, Nevada.

titles.title: A bill to declare that all right, title, and interest of the United States in 2,640 acres, more or less, are hereby held by the United States in trust for the Paiute-Shoshone Tribe of the Fallon Indian Reservation, Nevada.
